main event: A brilliant white light was observed approaching a car at high speed, appearing to come directly toward it.
interesting points: The light initially looked like an auto headlight before rapidly increasing in size,The object left a fiery trail of colors other than bluish-white,The observation was made from Fairchild AFB, Washington,The sighting was classified as an Astro (Meteoro),The event was recorded in a military document as part of the investigation into unusual aerial sightings.
